level.heading: SUMMARY OF EMBEDDED COST OF PREFERRED STOCK (ยง 15-204)

level.text: The following data shall be provided for preferred stock for the historical test year and the proposed test year:
Type, dividend rate, and par value;
Par value outstanding or to be outstanding;
Net proceeds after premium and issue expense;
Summary of stock provisions as to convertibility, redemption, sinking fund, preference provisions, and penalties in event of default.

Bell Atlantic – Washington, D.C., Inc., shall provide the data cited under ยง 204.1 for its corporate entity, and on a Bell Atlantic consolidated basis. Consolidated data may be shown in summary form with reference to source documents containing the information.
